column1: The Beast of Gondolin was a great Dragons of Morgoth that carried Balrogs upon its back during the Fall of Gondolin.  He was said to be a Fire-drake
column2: and upon entering the city through a breech in the wall cleared the streets with bursts of flame.  The dread of this beast was great upon the Gondothlim
column3: and he almost slew Tuor and Ecthelion with his massive feet
column4: save that Tuor stabbed him in the foot. No more is said of this beast
column5: save that his tail killed many of both orcs and Noldor in his agony.
